channel.title: Tutorial on Unabatedly Eigen
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Unabatedly Eigen

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction Wow I actually changed something! We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template. Then we’ll add in a few pages and posts. With small variations on that, you will be able to create many different types of web sites. In this tutorial, commands that you enter will start with the “$” prompt. The output will follow. Lines that start with “#” are comments that I’ve added to explain a point.
